posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302253954', 'Rent: $2,500 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', "This one won't last!", 'This spacious studio is in the perfect Harvard Square location, just steps to the red line and everything Harvard Square has to offer.', '-Great natural light', '-Excellent location', '-Close to the Red Line', '-No security deposit!', '-Rent includes heat and hot water', 'Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!', 'Encore Realty', 'Share your search criteria with me here:', '<URL>', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
